name: Weapon Triangle
title: Weapon Triangle
text:
Weapon triangle grants bonuses/penalties dependent on weapon type (1 dmg/15 hit).
Sword>Axe>Lance>Sword.
Anima>Light>Dark>Anima.

name: Effective Damage
title: Effective Damage
text: Effective damage multiplies a weapon's MT by 3, when used against a specifed unit type.

name: Bonus Exp.
title: Bonus Experience
text: Bonus experience will level up 3 stats at once. Chance relative to unit's growths.

name: Canter
title: Canter
text: After initiating combat, unit can move the number of tiles specified.

name: Poison
title: Poison
text: Unit receives 1-5 damage at the start of their turn.

name: Frozen/Sleep
title: Frozen/Sleep
text: Unit cannot fight, move, or avoid attacks.

name: Chill
title: Chill
text: Three stacks of chill will leave a unit frozen.

name: Eirika
title: Eirika
text:
Eirika is the protagonist of the Sacred Stones. She wields a Rapier.{br}
Eirika was born a poor black child, but made it big on the stock market.

name: Aerial
title: Aerial
text: A jovial man who can make friends with anyone and pushes himself with rigorous daily training. Has the biggest appetite in the army.

name: Apple
title: Apple
text: A fashionable mercenary who hopes to ditch the sword and open up his own shop. Not Angel!

name: Angel
title: Angel
text: A snarky mage who has a knack for gaining and spreading information. Rumour has it his glasses are only comsetic, purely an attempt to make him appear smarter.

name: Aspl
title: Aspl
text: A young boy who joined the army to attempt to demonstrate how he is comparable with the Gods, managing to survive as he is unfathomably lucky.

name: Blazing
title: Blazing
text: A kindhearted son of a noble whose beliefs give him the strength to face the world. Worries often that his prayers do not reach the gods.

name: Boey
title: Boey
text: An airheaded mercenary whose lack of forethought is either endearing or infuriating, making his business a coin toss.

name: Bread
title: Bread
text: Second born child to a baker, forcing them to become a knight while their brother would take over the business. Adores cute things and uses them to escape the harshness of fighting.

name: Cacti
title: Cacti
text: A righteous wielder of light magic who wishes to purge the lands of all that is wicked, but can be too brazen and end up in trouble...

name: Cherry
title: Cherry Von Maple
text: After overcoming her perpetual shyness, Cherry is anything but anxious. She isn't afraid to gossip about anyone, so long as they deserve it.

name: Demonic
title: Pete Aters
text: A senile old guy who is far from his prime, but gives it his all anyway. Earned his title "Demonic" by terrorising friend and foe alike.

name: Eff
title: Eff Yu
text: A smart guy who isn't afraid to let you know it. Thankfully he can back up his talk with his strategy, axe and powerful magic.

name: Landros
title: Landros
text: An nobleman who had joined the army by order of his parents. Uses the bow to stay out of harms way, letting him analyse the weather.

name: Leap
title: Leap
text:
Leap was raised an oprhan in the clergy and fell in love with fashion. While they no longer practice faith, they remain a great healer.{br}
Leap can buff ally speed and resistance after healing, making them fit for multiple combats against mages.

name: Max
title: Max Irmus
text: A

name: Maro
title: Maro
text:
A new soldier in Sages' army, serving under Sal. He likes to fit the mantle of a soldier, but can be scattered.{br}
Maro enjoys well kept weapons and benefits from having weapons with more uses.

name: Prof
title: Brendan Essar
text: Known to most as "Prof" due to his ethusiasm towards teaching, and not much else... The most self effacing in the army.

name: Roag
title: Roag
text: A flamboyant cavalier who tries to follow trends, he truly cares for his allies and will protect them with his life.

name: Sal
title: Sal Ith
text: After the disgrace of her family, she worked hard to restore her image under Sages' army. She loves telling others to sleep, but does it mostly out of kindness.

name: Shini
title: Shini
text: A swordsman who serves the church to raise funds. He doesn't enjoy fighting, but it's all he knows.

name: Smoke
title: Smoke
text: Dubbed "Smoke" for his tendency to vanish into thin air. Tries to act enigmatic, much to the chagrin of his comrades.
